item.title: A net theoretic approach to homotopy theory
item.description: arXiv:2410.18245v2 Announce Type: replace-cross Abstract: This paper uses a net-theoretic approach to convergence spaces, aimed to simplify the description of continuous convergence in order to apply it in problems concerning Homotopy Theory. We present methods for handling homotopies of limit spaces, define fundamental groupoids, and prove a generalized version of the Seifert-van Kampen Theorem for limit spaces.
item.dc:creator: Renan Maneli Mezabarba, Rodrigo Santos Monteiro, Thales Fernando Vilamaior Paiva
